divs: Sighting DetailsWhile watching a Fox Newscast in the background at almost the end of the video, a UFO flys by only in a few frames. If you allready know about this good, I down loaded this video and have been showing it to my family and friends. Every one of them has told me to do something with it. So here I am. if you are interested. I guarantee you you will be after seeing this video. I am sending a portion of this video that I converted from flash to mpeg. I have the original flash file as shown on Comcast Cable. If interested let me know Monte
Summary: UFO caught on a News cast (apparently unnoticed)
